channel.title: Flax picker help(modify plz)
channel.description:
I am refering to this scar script: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,59704.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,59704.0.html[/url] Its a sweet script, but there is a small problem with its OCR: "Error in BenMouse Report: -1, 0 : 0, 0 : 15;" This has happened because it went the wrong way(it has done this 4 times so far for me.) from the bank. The bank: [img]http://www.kloplop321.com/apics/Hr-20Min-19sec-59milisec-875.png[/img]
Step 1 to flax field: ignore the text on this one [img]http://www.kloplop321.com/apics/Hr-20Min-20sec-11milisec-859.png[/img]
Step 2 to flax feild: [img]http://www.kloplop321.com/apics/Hr-20Min-20sec-23milisec-875.png[/img]
Flax field: [img]http://www.kloplop321.com/apics/Hr-20Min-20sec-35milisec-906.png[/img]
But this these are the locations it will get stuck at. [img]http://www.kloplop321.com/apics/Hr-20Min-20sec-11milisec-859.png[/img]
[img]http://www.kloplop321.com/apics/Hr-20Min-19sec-34milisec-890.png[/img]
I just would like a alteration of this code to be a backup to where it will test if it is here to see if it is lost, otherwise try 6 times then logout and say "Please go back in the bank and restart" then walk it's way to the bank and restart the script(with the old Var's still there(flax picked, how many runs to do, runs so far, and user & pass) ) It uses the tree and bank symbols to guide it.
Sorry, but to me, I can read and get the grasps but not write it.. I don't know SCAR too well.

item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

You don’t understand, it does use the symbols, but it needs a backup system incase if it gets lost (1/230 chance) but when it does it really stinks.cuz then I have to set it up again…

item.title: Flax picker help(modify plz)
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

I am refering to this scar script: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,59704.0.html Its a sweet script, but there is a small problem with its OCR:
“Error in BenMouse
Report: -1, 0 : 0, 0 : 15;”
This has happened because it went the wrong way(it has done this 4 times so far for me.) from the bank.
The bank:

Step 1 to flax field: ignore the text on this one

Step 2 to flax feild:

Flax field:

But this these are the locations it will get stuck at.

I just would like a alteration of this code to be a backup to where it will test if it is here to see if it is lost, otherwise try 6 times then logout and say “Please go back in the bank and restart” then walk it’s way to the bank and restart the script(with the old Var’s still there(flax picked, how many runs to do, runs so far, and user & pass) ) It uses the tree and bank symbols to guide it.

Sorry, but to me, I can read and get the grasps but not write it… I don’t know SCAR too well.
